form1.description: This form collects general information such as name, date of birth and personal preferences. It is a basic record to organize and contextualize each participant's data.

inputTitle.question5: What do you prefer doing on your free time? *

form2.description: This questionnaire allows you to evaluate different aspects of the course, from the content to the methodology used. It also includes a space for comments on possible improvements.

inputTitle.question1: Is there anything you would have done differently this school year? *
inputTitle.question2: How would you rate your satisfaction with the course content? *
inputTitle.question3: Did you attend all the classes? (Select 1 option) *
inputTitle.question4: Which class schedules do you prefer? (Select up to 2 options) *

inputContent.question1: The content of the course classes was okay, but it would have been more useful with more worked examples

form3.description: A short questionnaire to find out what systems, devices and technological tools you use most frequently, as well as the topics you would like to learn about in the future.

inputTitle.question1: What technology would you like to learn in the future? *
inputTitle.question2: Which operating system do you prefer to use? *
inputTitle.question3: What devices do you use regularly? (Select up to 2 options) *
inputTitle.question4: How many hours per week do you dedicate to learning about technology? *

form4.description: Here we collect data on the genres of movies you enjoy the most, the ones you have seen and how often you usually watch movies.

inputTitle.question1: What genre of movies do you prefer? *
inputTitle.question3: Have you seen any of the following movies? *
inputTitle.question4: How often do you whatch movies? *
